Articles.Content: Hi im looking to land on an astroid like ESA did with Rosetta and the Lander (which i forgot the name of the lander) but anyways i think it should have harpoons, drills, and more. now i would do it myself but i don't know how to use Blender nor how to program it.
You could get harpoons from Kerbal Attachment System, a surface sample drill from DMagic Orbital Science, and possibly bits from other mods too. Maybe that helps?
yea But im talking about mod thats all in one file plus those mods ain't updated yet and i dont know how to use the harpoon from KAS
Um... Those mods ARE updated, I use them. If you don't know how to use the harpoon ask on the KAS thread. And there isn't a mod with all of those. It's not that hard to download 2 things.

> 
> Um... Those mods ARE updated, I use them. If you don't know how to use the harpoon ask on the KAS thread. And there isn't a mod with all of those. It's not that hard to download 2 things.

to 1.0.4???
Doesn't matter. 1.0.4 won't break 1.0.2 part mods.
yeah, the pop up is just a warning because AVC is set to check version numbers, it won't actually break the mod.
Would it be off topic to remind everyone that this landing scheme... failed?

> 
> Would it be off topic to remind everyone that this landing scheme... failed?

But out then it just makes it more Kerbal!
